The thoracic surgery attend physician determine feasibility resection . If patient resectable disease , attend thoracic surgeon perform thoracotomy anatomical resection . If patient unresectable disease , subject follow 30 day post NFV administration . After initial 30 day post-NFV , subject follow long-term outcome ( disease response overall survival ) .
